snippet.title: Bonds - Steam release trailer
snippet.description:
A trailer video for Bonds, a DID game which was first released on Itch.io December 2017 and has come to Steam today.

You can try the demo and/or buy the full game for Windows and Mac on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/955400/Bonds/
You can buy it or try the demo for ALL 4 PLATFORMS shown in the video here: https://didgames.itch.io/bonds
